projects.title: Jeopardy! Game
projects.description: Interactive Jeopardy game that fetches real questions from an API, with dynamic categories and question/answer reveal mechanics
features: Fetches random categories from Jeopardy API
Click to reveal question, click again to reveal answer
Restart game to get new categories
Responsive design for different screen sizes
Visual feedback on hover and click
projects.challenges: Managing asynchronous API calls and ensuring smooth data flow between multiple categories. Handling different states (loading, question, answer) for each clue cell.
projects.learnings: Gained experience with async/await, working with external APIs, DOM manipulation with jQuery, and state management in vanilla JavaScript. Learned to handle API responses and dynamically populate HTML tables.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform (Capstone Project)
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, and payment integration - Currently in planning/development phase
features: Product browsing with search and filters
projects.challenges: Building a secure, scalable e-commerce solution with proper payment handling and user management
projects.learnings: Will gain deep understanding of authentication flows, API integration, payment processing, and state management in React
